title: BRACE Centre funded for a further five years to evaluate initiatives which seek to join up and transform patient care
descriptions: The Birmingham, RAND and Cambridge rapid service evaluation centre, known as BRACE, has been commissioned for five more years following the award of Â£3 million funding from the National Institute for Health and Care Research (NIHR), the largest national clinical research funder in Europe.

image.desc: Patient and doctor looking at a mobile tablet, photo by Fly View Productions/Getty Images
